name: Form API
description: This snippet adds a form with the Next.js API route for submission.

files.name: FORM
files.explanation: The form should be placed on the frontend in a `forms/<FORM>.ts` file.

files.name: ROUTE
files.explanation: The `route.ts` file should be placed at `app/api/<FEATURE>/route.ts`. This can be imported as import '@/app/api/<FEATURE>/route.ts'.

files.name: VALIDATION
files.explanation: The `validation.ts` file should be placed at `app/api/<FEATURE>/validation.ts`. This can be imported as import '@/app/api/<FEATURE>/validation.ts'.
